# Locations of languages studied by researchers at Latrobe University

The map below shows locations of languages for which an illustration in the Journal of the International Phonetic Association has been published by researchers at Latrobe University. 

Click on the pin on the map to identify the language and follow the link to the publication.

library(knitr)
read_chunk("mkMaps.R")
